00039    /*
00040    * Read time step dt.
00041    */
00042    void NveIntegrator::readParam(std::istream& in)
00043    {
00044       //readBegin(in, "NveIntegrator");
00045       read<double>(in, "dt", dt_);
00046       //readEnd(in);
00047 
00048       int nAtomType = simulation().nAtomType();
00049       if (!prefactors_.isAllocated()) {
00050          prefactors_.allocate(nAtomType);
00051       }
00052 
00053    }
00054 
00055    void NveIntegrator::setup()
00056    {
00057       #if 0
00058       atomStorage().clearSnapshot();
00059       exchanger().exchange();
00060       pairPotential().buildCellList();
00061       if (!UTIL_ORTHOGONAL) {
00062          atomStorage().transformGenToCart(boundary());
00063       }
00064       atomStorage().makeSnapshot();
00065       pairPotential().buildPairList();
00066       simulation().computeForces();
00067       #endif
00068       // Exchange atoms, build pair list, compute forces.
00069       setupAtoms();
00070 
00071       simulation().diagnosticManager().setup();
00072 
00073       // Set prefactors for acceleration
00074       double dtHalf = 0.5*dt_;
00075       double mass;
00076       int nAtomType = prefactors_.capacity();
00077       for (int i = 0; i < nAtomType; ++i) {
00078          mass = simulation().atomType(i).mass();
00079          prefactors_[i] = dtHalf/mass;
00080       }
00081    }
00082 
00083    void NveIntegrator::integrateStep1()
00084    {
00085       Vector dv;
00086       Vector dr;
00087       double prefactor; // = 0.5*dt/mass
00088       AtomIterator atomIter;
00089 
00090       // 1st half of velocity Verlet.
00091       atomStorage().begin(atomIter);
00092       for ( ; atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00093          prefactor = prefactors_[atomIter->typeId()];
00094 
00095          dv.multiply(atomIter->force(), prefactor);
00096          atomIter->velocity() += dv;
00097 
00098          dr.multiply(atomIter->velocity(), dt_);
00099          atomIter->position() += dr;
00100       }
00101    }
00102 
00103    void NveIntegrator::integrateStep2()
00104    {
00105       Vector dv;
00106       double prefactor; // = 0.5*dt/mass
00107       AtomIterator atomIter;
00108 
00109       // 2nd half of velocity Verlet
00110       atomStorage().begin(atomIter);
00111       for ( ; atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00112          prefactor = prefactors_[atomIter->typeId()];
00113          dv.multiply(atomIter->force(), prefactor);
00114          atomIter->velocity() += dv;
00115       }
00116 
00117    }
